title: Please identify this art nouveau type
content:
Anyone knows something similar to this? Has it been digitized? Or the name of this font? The scan is taken from Tashen's "Type. A Visual History of Typefaces & Graphic Styles" and the font was created for Società Augusta in Torino. Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128im_/http:/typophile.com/files/_Q6Q91673_5991.jpg)

Font: 

 Nebiolo/Societa Augusta Type Foundry 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [\_Q6Q91674.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/typophile.com/files/_Q6Q91674.jpg) | 38.74 KB |
author: rstefan250

comments.content:
Nebiolo absorbed several other foundries after 1889 and for some time the company was called Società Augusta, but it reverted to Nebiolo&Co in 1917. See Luc Devroye's Nebiolo page [http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-36780.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/luc.devroye.org/fonts-36780.html "http://luc.devroye.org/fonts-36780.html"). So this font could have been in a Nebilo catalog. The Klingspor musueum has listed many, & perhaps all, of the types ever made by Nebiolo [http://www.klingspor-museum.de/KlingsporKuenstler/Schriftgiessereien/Neb...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.klingspor-museum.de/KlingsporKuenstler/Schriftgiessereien/Nebiolo/Nebiolo.pdf "http://www.klingspor-museum.de/KlingsporKuenstler/Schriftgiessereien/Nebiolo/Nebiolo.pdf") but does not show any images. So the name could perhaps be on this list.  
Probably not digitized.  
Some substitutes. Cognac [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/cognac/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/cognac/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/cognac/") Secession [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/secession/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/secession/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/secession/") Künstler Grotesk ML [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/kunstler-grotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/kunstler-grotesk/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/kunstler-grotesk/") Auchentaller [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/auchentaller/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/auchentaller/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/auchentaller/") Sparticus [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/sparticus/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/sparticus/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/sparticus/") Roberta [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/roberta/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/roberta/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/roberta/") Rotorua [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/rotorua/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/rotorua/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/rotorua/") Vienna Workshop [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/vienna-workshop/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/vienna-workshop/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/vienna-workshop/") Himmelblau [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/himmelblau/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/himmelblau/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/himmelblau/") P22 Arts and Crafts [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/arts-and-crafts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/arts-and-crafts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/arts-and-crafts/") Kolo LP [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/kolo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/kolo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterperfect/kolo/")  
Don

A few more: Quaint Gothic SG [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/quaint-gothic-sg/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/quaint-gothic-sg/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/quaint-gothic-sg/") Aka Desdemona [http://www.will-harris.com/store-h/desdemona.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.will-harris.com/store-h/desdemona.html "http://www.will-harris.com/store-h/desdemona.html") Semiramis [http://www.will-harris.com/store-h/desdemona.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.will-harris.com/store-h/desdemona.html "http://www.will-harris.com/store-h/desdemona.html") Syracuse [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/arroyostyle/syracuse/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/arroyostyle/syracuse/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/arroyostyle/syracuse/") Vienna Workshop [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/vienna-workshop/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/vienna-workshop/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/vienna-workshop/") ITC Stocklet [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/stoclet-light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/stoclet-light/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/stoclet-light/") and last but not least Epitaph  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/epitaph/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/epitaph/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/epitaph/")  
Don

As always Don, thank you! And thanks for the links also. They are a great help :)

Stefan

One more to throw into the hat: Scriptorium's [Beaumains](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075128/http:/www.fontcraft.com/Merchant2/merchant.mv?Screen=PROD&Product_Code=beaumains&Category_Code=) (which I know as Livonia).
